## Theme.defineTheme() method

Define a new Blockly theme.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static defineTheme(name: string, themeObj: AnyDuringMigration): Theme;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the theme. |
|  themeObj | AnyDuringMigration | An object containing theme properties. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Theme](./blockly.theme.md)
